data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: The was an oil spill in the park. Petrol, diesel and other flammible liquids from the nearby fuel station had seeped into the ground and were bubbling up between the cracks. Some suggested using big sponges to remove it, but in the end a pump was brought which was able to suck away most of the liquid.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: They marched along, stamping their feet to the words. the rhymthing then changed, slowing, and their boots crunched to the ground for each letter of the word. S-E -N -D. T-H-E-M. H-O-M-E. Watching as they went past we wondered - send who home?

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: Of course, I had to comply and enter the church as he had suggested. In it was an enourmous organ, the biggest in the whole empire i was told. I looked at it for a long time, but struggles to find any beauty in it.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: It was a gloomy evening, but i felt glad that gloom should exist. Gloom was the payment we had to suffer in order to fully appreciate the glory of a bright star-filled sky which only shows in our skies about once a month.
